Package boundary

Class MovieControl

java.lang.Object
boundary.MovieControl
public class MovieControl extends Object
Contains the functions to modify the Movie database (csv file)
Author:
SS4 Group 4

    • chooseCast

      public List<String> chooseCast()
      Console interface to prompt user to enter the cast's name to add. Each cast will be added to a temporary String list
      Returns:
      List of cast added by user

    • chooseShowingStatus

      public String chooseShowingStatus()
      Console interface to prompt user to select the showing status of a movie. (1) Coming soon (2) Preview (3) Now Showing (4) End Of Showing
      Returns:
      showing status of a movie

    • chooseAgeRating

      public String chooseAgeRating()
      Console interface to prompt user to select the age rating of a movie. (1) PG (2) PG13 (3) NC16 (4) M18 (5) R21
      Returns:
      age rating of a movie

    • updateAddCast

      public String updateAddCast()
      Updating a movie information. Console interface to prompt user to enter a cast name to add to the current list of casts.
      Returns:
      cast

    • updateReview

      public void updateReview(Movie mov, List<Movie> movieBeans) throws com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvDataTypeMismatchException, com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvRequiredFieldEmptyException, IllegalStateException, IOException
      Console interface for a user to leave a review on the selected movie.
      Parameters:
      mov - the Movie selected to leave a review on
      movieBeans - list of Movie objects extracted from the movie database (csv file)
      Throws:
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvDataTypeMismatchException
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvRequiredFieldEmptyException
      IllegalStateException
      IOException
